description: Full Stack Engineer building performant web applications and developer tools. Currently crafting interfaces at Vercel

hero.title: Full Stack Engineer
hero.p1: building performant web applications and developer tools. Currently crafting interfaces at Vercel
hero.p2: Previously shipped products at Linear, Stripe, and early-stage startups. I care about clean code, fast load times, and thoughtful UX.
hero.p3: When not coding, you'll find me contributing to open source, writing about web performance, or exploring new frameworks.

item_1.name: hybrid-astro-ui
item_1.description: UI elements for Astro using a hybrid model: zero-JS Astro + progressive enhancement with web components.

item_2.name: http-sentinel
item_2.description: A TypeScript library that provides a comprehensive set of HTTP error classes and utilities for handling HTTP errors.

item_3.name: gitzen
item_3.description: AI-powered CLI tool for automatic git commit message generation.

item_4.name: NovaBoost
item_4.description: Free Astro 5 & TailwindCSS blog template—SEO-optimized, with JSON-LD and optional AI post generation.

item_5.name: astro-i18n
item_5.description: Simple internationalization (i18n) library for Astro with TypeScript support.

item_6.name: astro-collections
item_6.description: A collection utilities library for Astro framework, providing easy collection management components.

item_7.name: Geofisik Tool
item_7.description: Geophysical web application to monitor vertical displacements in structures with interactive maps and time-series charts.

item_8.name: EmoteShowcase
item_8.description: Web app for dynamic resizing and visualization of emotes with live previews and optimized export for streaming.

item_1.description: Building the frontend cloud. Working on the dashboard, deployment infrastructure, and developer experience.

item_2.description: Shipped real-time sync, keyboard-first interactions, and performance optimizations.

item_3.description: Designed payment flows and merchant dashboards. Led the migration to React 18 and improved CI/CD pipelines.

item_4.description: First engineering hire. Built the core product from scratch using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
